title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 09 August 2016 - XWiki
content:
<tmortagne> has quit  
03:07 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:08 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
03:14 <lkrejci> has quit  
04:50 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
09:26 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:39 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:55 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> has joined #xwiki  
09:56 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> Hi there! Is there a way to force ldap authenticator to search user from cn=users,cn=accounts instead of cn=users,cn=compat?  
09:57 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> Mapping of user fields fails because cn=compat shows limited set of attributes  
10:18 <Chuguniy> has joined #xwiki  
10:20 <acotiuga> has quit  
10:21 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:26 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:32 <lkrejci> has quit  
10:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> I'm going to spam 4 lines to clarify the problem:  
10:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> o.x.c.l.XWikiLDAPConnection    - Binding to LDAP server with credentials login=[uid=teemu,cn=users,cn=accounts,dc=rex,dc=fi]  
10:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> o.x.c.l.XWikiLDAPUtils         - Searching for the user in LDAP: user [teemu] base [dc=rex,dc=fi] query [(uid=teemu)] uid [uid]  
10:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> o.x.c.l.XWikiLDAPConnection    - LDAP search: baseDN=[dc=rex,dc=fi] query=[(uid=teemu)] attr=[[givenName, sn, mail, mobile]] ldapScope=[2]  
10:42 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> o.x.c.l.XWikiLDAPConnection    - LDAP search found attributes [[{name=dn value=uid=teemu,cn=users,cn=compat,dc=rex,dc=fi}]]  
10:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> So you see that LDAP search somehow got dn with cn=compat, can you tell me why is this?  
10:43 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> LDAP back-end is 389 server in FreeIPA installation  
11:12 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
11:25 <acotiuga> Hi @xwikiorg\_guest\_4! Could you check if your (uid=teemu) exists in both cn=accounts and cn=compat?  
11:29 <tmortagne> xwikiorg\_guest\_4: as you can see from the log it searched an entry with uid filed value being equals to teemu and the first it found is uid=teemu,cn=users,cn=compat,dc=rex,dc=fi  
11:30 <tmortagne> what xwiki.authentication.ldap.bind\_DN did you use ?  
11:34 <tmortagne> you can force it to search only inside cn=accounts,dc=rex,dc=fi by by setting it as base DN (unless you also need to find users or groups outside of cn=accounts,dc=rex,dc=fi)  
11:37 <lincolna\_> has joined #xwiki  
11:37 <lincolna\_> has quit  
11:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> It was solved by adding directory to base\_DN like this: cn=users,cn=compat,dc=rex,dc=fi  
11:47 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> thank you for your help!  
11:51 <tmortagne> xwikiorg\_guest\_4: you might need to remove the "cn=users," part if you want to play with groups membership  
11:52 <xwikiorg\_guest\_4> tmortagne: I'll do that, groups probably will come into play later  
13:42 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
13:43 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:48 <lkrejci> has quit  
13:48 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
14:01 <vmassol> has quit  
14:09 <lincolna> where's the documentation page with all the members of $doc on it again?  
14:48 <lkrejci> has quit  
14:48 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
15:02 <edvorg> has joined #xwiki  
15:10 <tmortagne> lincolna: http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ScriptingDocumentation/ ?  
15:11 <lincolna> Yes, that's it  
15:11 <lincolna> thanks  
15:11 <tmortagne> which you can install in your own instance so that it matched your exact version  
15:12 <tmortagne> ( http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Scripting+Documentation+Application )  
15:12 <lincolna> also, wouldn't have been frustrated by xwiki.org being down for an hour or so earlier  
15:12 <lincolna> might do that, thanks  
15:12 <tmortagne> yes xwiki.org was not in a good shape, I restarted it
